article_title: Greater Fall River small business owners have a clear message, they've got big problems

article_metadata.description:
FALL RIVER — He finished three days of hard work this year without any sense of accomplishment, Brian LeComte said. He knew, next year, he would be doing the same thing with slightly different numbers.
This year, it was figuring out how the new overtime regulations would affect Gold Medal Bakery, where LeComte serves as treasurer.
The Affordable Care Act took his time last year. Next year, learning the new rules applying to sick leave and paid leave will demand his time.
“We spend
article_metadata.author: Kevin P. O'Connor
